bug_report.Summary: The feedback form is not opened after clicking the 'Обратная связь' button
bug_report.Author: Minienok Y

Description.bug: The feedback form is not opened after clicking the "Обратная связь" button
Description.expected: Exp: The feedback form or contact information is dispayed on the site after clicking the "Обратная связь" button
Description.actual: Act: The feedback form is not opened after clicking the "Обратная связь" button

bug_report.Steps: <1step>1) go to the site https://multiplex.ua/</1step> <2step>2) click on the drop-down menu in the upper left corner of te page</2step> <3step>3) click on the "О компании" button</3step> <4step>4) click on the "обратная связь" button</4step> <5step>5) pay attention to the page</5step>
